SEARCH
Package org.mazeApp.controller

Class GeneratorControlleur

java.lang.Object
org.mazeApp.controller.GeneratorControlleur
public class GeneratorControlleur extends Object
Controller responsible for maze generation.

This class manages the user interface components and logic for generating, animating, saving, and loading mazes in the application.

It handles user inputs such as dimensions and seed, and supports different maze generation algorithms (Kruskal and DFS).
